thread.title: Thursday Poll: What Flagship Are You Leaning Towards Currently?
thread.title_full: Thursday Poll: What Flagship Are You Leaning Towards Currently?

author: Tim-o-tato
title: Thursday Poll: What Flagship Are You Leaning Towards Currently?
text:
opening now. seriously, thanks =) Howard Stern ✓ᵛᵉʳᶦᶠᶦᵉᵈ 
not that HTC phone. it looks like a one+ 3t in the front and ANY samsung on the back. HTC needs to find an identity. i’m leaning towards the G6. I’m sure most are going with that S8, that phone is going to be a BEAST. Dustin Wood 
I feel phones have sorta hit a plateau. Nothing thrills me right now. Phones keep changing things away from how I want them, so I figured I’d wait out a generation or two to see if they start to go back. Plus, with no subsidized cheaper phones, I’m not going to pay a monthly fee, or $700 for a phone outright. Howard Stern ✓ᵛᵉʳᶦᶠᶦᵉᵈ 
yeah I feel the same…its getting exciting again. love it. mustbepbs 
That’s why I got rid of my iPhone 7 Plus (with a monthly $45 payment) and picked up a OP3T. Best decision I ever made. Chris 
Xiaomi Mi Mix is the only phone I’ve seen lately that blew me away. I’m just waiting for them or someone else to create one that’s less fragile, has a great camera, and isn’t $1000 (because of rarity and import costs) B! 
I felt that way about the Note 5 as far as skipping a generation due to no SD card slot. AUSTEEEZZZ 
Note 8… Straight Fire! About Droid Life 
We consider ourselves to have the greatest Android community in the world, here at Droid Life . We talk general news, feature apps, review phones, and even teach you how to hack a little. But most importantly, there is no place on the internet that has the reader participation that we do and consider ourselves to be completely community driven. If you were looking for the best place to learn about Android and talk with like-minded folks about all things tech, then Droid Life is for you. Follow Us
